docs.title: 📚 Hands-On Data Integration Tutorial
docs.text:
Welcome to the hands-on tutorial for setting up Fivetran, Snowflake, dbt Cloud, and GitHub.

This tutorial covers: ✅ Connecting Fivetran to Snowflake ✅ Setting up dbt Cloud for transformation ✅ Using GitHub for version control

docs.title: Step 1: Create a Snowflake Account
docs.text:
1. Go to Snowflake Signup and create a free trial account.
  2. Choose AWS, Azure, or GCP as your cloud provider.
  3. Save your Account URL, Username, and Password.

docs.title: Step 2: Create a Snowflake Warehouse
docs.text:
Run the following SQL command in Snowflake to create a dedicated warehouse:

CREATE WAREHOUSE my_wh
  WITH WAREHOUSE_SIZE = 'XSMALL'
  AUTO_SUSPEND = 300
  AUTO_RESUME = TRUE;

docs.title: Step 1: Sign Up for Fivetran
docs.text:
1. Go to Fivetran and create an account.
  2. In Destinations, click Set up Snowflake.
  3. Enter your Snowflake Account URL, and Warehouse.

docs.title: Step 2: Configure Connection
docs.text:
• Host: <your_snowflake_account>.snowflakecomputing.com
  • User: FIVETRAN_USER
  • Password: Generated Password
  • Warehouse: my_wh
  • Database: fivetran_db
  • Schema: fivetran_schema

✅ Click Test Connection and then Save.

docs.title: Step 1: Create a dbt Cloud Account
docs.text:
1. Sign up at dbt Cloud.
  2. Create a new project.
  3. Select Snowflake as the connection type.

docs.title: Step 3: Run a dbt Model
docs.text:
Create a new model (models/my_model.sql) with:

SELECT * FROM fivetran_db.fivetran_schema.table_name;

Run:

dbt run

✅ You should see the transformed data.

docs.title: Step 1: Create a GitHub Repository
docs.text:
1. Go to GitHub and create a new repository.
  2. Clone it to your local machine:
git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo.git

docs.title: Step 2: Push dbt Code to GitHub
docs.text:
cd your-repo
git add .
git commit -m "Initial dbt setup"
git push origin main

✅ Now your dbt project is version-controlled.

docs.title: ✅ Next Steps
docs.text:
🎯 Schedule Fivetran syncs 🎯 Automate dbt transformations 🎯 Monitor data pipelines

🚀 You're now set up for full data automation!
